os.fullpath: Operating System :: Handheld/Embedded Operating Systems :: Android

name: MyIGo

screenshots.caption: The user interface after the user log in the system
The customer use the cellphone to find the shop
The screen remind the user that there is a shop in frount
The information and the comments of the place

short_description:
IGo aims to help customer to find shops and get recommendation and promotion easily and fast and it is a pleasure and cool experience. This system includes two different groups of users: customers and sellers. The customer use the Android application to find the most interested place he is looking for, while the seller use the Website to get the information and the location of the customer and set the discount to the certain customer.

Our innovations are: 
1. UI Design to enhance the interaction between user and app ,offering a cool user experience interaction between the user and the business part.
2. Combine context awareness technology to analyse the user’s need.
3. Make the better recommendation of shops to the customer.
summary: IGO helps you find want you need!
